name: Negligent homicide in the first degree
text:
(1)  A person is guilty of the offense of negligent homicide in the first degree if that person causes the death of another person by the operation of a vehicle in a negligent manner while under the influence of drugs or alcohol.
	(2)  Negligent homicide in the first degree is a class B felony. [L 1988, c 292, pt of §1]
